titleStmt.title: The second part of The honest whore with the humours of the patient man, the impatient wife: the honest whore, perswaded by strong arguments to turne curtizan againe: her braue refuting those arguments. And lastly, the comicall passages of an Italian bridewell, where the scæne ends. Written by Thomas Dekker.
Honest whore. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Elizabeth All-de, for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The honest whore.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
